topic.title: How to Set the Number of Characters Allowed in Negative Ratings Survey

body.p: It is possible to configure the maximum number of characters that are allowed in the negative feedback component. If the Allow page ratings option is enabled in the General Settings page, you can also enable the Display survey for negative ratings option to display a survey component in the output for collecting negative feedback from users and you can configure the options that are displayed in the survey when a negative vote is registered.

To configure the maximum number of characters that are allowed in the negative ratings survey that users submit, edit the value of the feedback.max.negative.rating.comment.character.size property in the config/feedback-application.properties file (do not exceed 10,000 characters).
